body.name: TeQsli Full Mattress 10 Inch, Sleep Cooler Eggshell Memory Foam and 7 Zone Pocket Innerspring Hybrid Mattress Medium Firm, Full Bed Mattress in a Box, 100 Night Trial
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 38 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: ❄️【𝑪𝒐𝒐𝒍𝒊𝒏𝒈 & 𝑩𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒉𝒂𝒃𝒍𝒆 𝑬𝒇𝒇𝒆𝒄𝒕】- TeQsli full mattress is made of high-end comfort knit fabric and eggshell convoluted foam. The convoluted foam can evenly disperse your body pressure, promote air flow and regulate your sleeping temperature, making your sleeping environment cool and cosy. After work, sleeping on the full size hybrid mattress will absolutely help soothe your nerves.

🌫【𝑴𝒐𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏 𝑰𝒔𝒐𝒍𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏 & 𝑬𝒅𝒈𝒆 𝑺𝒖𝒑𝒑𝒐𝒓𝒕】- The full size mattress features an individual pocket coils spring system that does well in motion insolation. When people or pets sleeping next to you move, you can still enjoy an undisturbed sleep. Reinforced edge support makes sure that sleepers will not slip off. Besides, it has a longer average lifespan than other traditional innerspring hybrid mattress.

💎【𝑷𝒓𝒆𝒔𝒔𝒖𝒓𝒆 & 𝑷𝒂𝒊𝒏 𝑹𝒆𝒍𝒊𝒆𝒇】- Our hybrid mattress full is medium firm. Conforming to body curves, it is good at targeting and relieving stress and can provide comfortable support for your neck, back and buttocks. A massage given by the convoluted foam will ease your tense muscles as well as your stress, so that you will wake up energetic in the fresh morning without pain or ache. Sound sleep makes good health.

📦【𝑴𝒂𝒕𝒕𝒓𝒆𝒔𝒔 𝒊𝒏 𝒂 𝑩𝒐𝒙】- Our full bed mattresses are professionally compressed and vacuum-sealed, neatly rolled up in a box, so it's even easier to bring sleep comfort into your home. Moreover, the full size mattress in a box fits all frames such as box springs, flooring, slatted bases, flat platforms.

🧏🏻‍♂️【𝑹𝒊𝒔𝒌-𝑭𝒓𝒆𝒆 𝑹𝒆𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒏 & 𝑾𝒂𝒓𝒓𝒂𝒏𝒕𝒚】- Sleeping preferences vary from person to person, so each TeQsli mattress comes with a 100-Night Trial, enough for you to determine if it is the right mattress. The mattress is Climate Pledge Friendly and CertiPUR-US certified to ensure a healthy and peaceful sleep. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact TeQsli service team, we will reply to you within 24 hours.▲Advice: Gives 48-72 hours to recover its original size ▲

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is protected in two clean films. After cutting the films (they included a tool which is safe to cut the film), the mattress inflates completely just in three seconds. It is so easy to set up. There is no unpleasant material smelling. The top fabric feels soft and comfortable. The size fits my bedroom very well. Worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid quality/ Cheaper Price/ Decent support
reviews.reviewText: The old one that we have is a MORGEDAL firm mattress from IKEA, which has been with us for years. My husband's always thought it's great, but as a mom who had a baby a year ago and is still getting back into the swing of things, it was a bit too firm for me. This foam mattress is solid in craftsmanship and support! The stitching is on point. I'm happy it arrived before Christmas, and when I popped the seal, there was hardly any smell – it pretty much puffed up right away. Still, I gave it a couple of days in the study before jumping in. This medium-firm is a real medium-firm compared to our old one. Sitting on the edge isn't as rock-hard as those spring ones, and sleeping on it doesn't feel like I'm sinking too deep. It gives decent support to my waist and back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this TeQsli mattress as Christmas gift for the new home, and used it for one month and a half. This is 10-inch Queen- size memory foam with pillow top. I like its breathable knit fabric, so I didn't sweat at nights. The pocket zones with hybrid innerspring coils give medium firmness, and allow release of long-sitting stress and my back pain. Also importantly, the mattess is certified by CertiPUR-US and manufactured with health safety material. Overall, I like this purchase and enjoy sleeping on this mattress. In future I may buy a thicker 12-in and firmer one of this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress overall
reviews.reviewText: A good mattress overall, feels good compared to my 5 year old mattress, lovely light sink in when lying down. Only complain is it not expanding the full 12inches, got to about 10.5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely comfortable. No more back pain.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for our spare room. I have a king sized memory foam in the master bedroom. We had to sleep on this for a few nights and oh man, my constant back pain went away like magic. It is extremely comfortable. Everyone who has slept on it says it is extremely comfortable. Not super supportive on the edges but what do you expect with a mattress in the mail? No stinky chemical smell, arrived super fast, lightweight enough to move around easily. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mattress hardness is moderate, did not expect is super elastic
reviews.reviewText: Mattress hardness is moderate, did not expect is super elastic, received the night to open a look at the workmanship and quality is really unexpected, the day quickly used, the morning felt immediately relieved my back pain, this is really my favorite, the child put it as a trampoline jumping for dozens of minutes a day, it looks like we choose the mattress right, A cost-effective good helper! 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and easy setup
reviews.reviewText: This product was simple and easy to assemble and arrived in an air tight instant set up. It’s great for when you don’t want to take a long time to set up. The bed was soft and fits really well with my bedroom and looks nice as well because it’s modern and has a good design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love sleeping in this mattress. It’s very comfortable and firm enough for not to get any back pain. Seems good quality and durable, hoping it to last next few years at least.
